text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to work at sea world?
text.Response A:
Working at SeaWorld is a unique and rewarding experience that offers a variety of opportunities for individuals to contribute to the conservation and preservation of marine life. Here are some general steps to working at SeaWorld:

1. Apply for a job: The first step is to apply for a job at SeaWorld. This can be done online or in person at the park.
2. Prepare for the interview: If you are selected for an interview, it is important to prepare for it thoroughly. This may involve researching the company, practicing common interview questions, and practicing your answers.
3. Attend the interview: During the interview, it is important to be professional and to focus on your strengths and experiences.
4. Follow up: After the interview, it is important to follow up with the company to express your continued interest in the position.

If you are interested in working at SeaWorld, it is important to research the company and the specific position you are applying for. This will help you prepare for the interview and to express your interest in the position.
text.Response B: Sure! To work at Sea World, you need to be 18 years or older. You can apply online or in person. If you are hired, you will need to pass a drug test and a background check. You will also need to be able to work long hours and be able to handle stress.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
